thread.title: Tourism minister launches ‘Zaika Dil Se’ at IATO convention in Indore
thread.title_full: Tourism minister launches ‘Zaika Dil Se’ at IATO convention in Indore | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Tourism minister launches ‘Zaika Dil Se’ at IATO convention in Indore
text:
Other Articles Bon Jovi says he didn't want to disappoint Vancouver fans Boaters mapping Pacific garbage to arrive in San Francisco North Dakota drone test site set to fly high at all hours Madhya Pradesh Tourism, in association with Express TravelWorld, has launched ‘Zaika Dil Se’, a coffee table book on the cuisines of different regions of Madhya Pradesh. The book was unveiled on the occasion of the 31st Annual Convention of Indian Association of Tour Operators (IATO) at Indore, MP.
‘Zaika Dil Se’, was launched by Dr Mahesh Sharma, Minister of State for Tourism and Culture and Minister of State for Civil Aviation, Government of India; Shivraj Singh Chouhan, Chief Minister, Madhya Pradesh; Surendra Patwa, Minister of State for Tourism and Culture, Government of Madhya Pradesh; Ashok Chandra Panda, Minister of State for Tourism and Culture, Government of Odisha; Ashwani Lohani, commissioner and MD, Madhya Pradesh Tourism and the entire IATO executive committee.
 21, 2015 11:38 am © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
